cleaned_text: A guided meditation that boosts immunity and improves your health through mindfulness, intentional breathing and visualization. This short Immune System Boosting guided meditation is designed to help you strengthen your immune system, raise oxygen levels in your blood stream and body, remove toxic build up and impurities, and raise your vibration to support the prevention and reduce the impact of disease, illness, viral and bacterial infections. We will be releasing a long and more in-depth version of this short meditation over the next few days. The inspiration for this meditation comes from a variety of ancient and modern techniques and traditions aimed at supporting health, wholeness, wellbeing, inner balance and harmony in body, mind, emotions, and spirit. Using this meditation in the optimal conditions can help support the prevention of illness, disease, and infections of all sorts or/ and reduce the duration of such conditions through the raising of your vibration and strengthening of your immune system.
